hruid.description: The human-readable identifier for the learning path. This is only unique in combination with a version and language.

language.description: The language of the learning path.

title.description: The title of the learning path.

description.description: A brief description of the learning path.
description.example: A beginner-friendly learning path for programming.

image.description: The image associated with the learning path in bytes.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the learning path was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the learning path was last updated.

id.description: The unique identifier for the learning path.
